temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The vehicle lead vehicle's position must be published to the vehicle in Follow mode using a telemetry system.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( not ( vehicleleadvehicl == sposioinpublished == Fvehilol ) and ehicledledlse == Folosil )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The altitude is maintained with the altitude hold controller so the vehicle will attempt to hold its current altitude when the sticks are placed with 10% of mid-throttle.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( altitudemaintain == itainedthaltrecolersoler ) until ( at == itrsoleclersole ) -> titscuretdt == ticstlicstedth1ithritlth1itlmdth == ithrtlotleitle )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: It will climb or descend at up to 2.5m/s (this speed is adjustable with the PILOT_SPEED_UP and PILOT_SPEED_DN parameters).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( climb == descedndup or ( sepedadj == dalwithPILOT_SED_UP ) -> P == PILOTE_SP and ( PLOED_SPE_Na == aED_rmeters ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The acceleration used to establish these speeds is set by PILOT_ACCEL_Z.
3.FOLL_DIST_MAX : if lead vehicle is more than this many meters away, give up on following and hold position
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( lFOLL_DIST_MAX == leadvehicle > manymeters = giveup and positeiveup == position )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 7.FOLL_POS_P : gain which controls how aggressively this vehicle moves towards lead vehicle (limited by WPNAV_SPEED )
